channel.description: Recent content in development on Dexter's Blog

item.title: How I Build My Blog With Hugo, GitHub Pages and GitHub Actions
item.description: This blog is about how I build my blog. The blog is built with Hugo and hosted in GitHub Pages. If you are interested in building your own site using Hugo and GitHub Pages, focus on the Quick Start part. Follow the given references and you can make it. Other parts are about my solutions to some problems or special requirements I faced when I built it. Quick Start Just follow Hugo - Quick Start and Hugo - Host on GitHub.
